examples: The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
Has the train from Bristol arrived?
The fast train arrived at the destination in no time.
Replies to the advertisement are arriving in fits and starts.
The elevator arrived after a couple of minutes of waiting.
words.defineEn: to reach a location, particularly as an end to a journey
words.defineVi: để đạt được một địa điểm, đặc biệt là kết thúc một cuộc hành trình

examples: Are you feeling comfortable?
He always wears comfortable clothes when he goes for a run.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
The room had a comfortable bed where she could rest.
The rug in front of the fireplace provides a comfortable spot to sit.
words.defineEn: physically feeling relaxed and not feeling pain, stress, fear, etc.
words.defineVi: thể chất cảm thấy thoải mái và không cảm thấy đau đớn, căng thẳng, sợ hãi, v.v.

examples: A mixture of skill and good luck decided the outcome of the game.
The courts decided in favor of the New York claimants.
The Appeal Court decided in their favour.
The case will be decided by a jury.
The government decided to abandon the proposed legislation due to public opposition.
words.defineEn: to think carefully about different things and choose one of them
words.defineVi: suy nghĩ cẩn thận về những điều khác nhau và chọn một trong số họ

examples: Offenders should receive their just deserts.
The west is home to vast deserts, rolling plains, and majestic mountain ranges.
The incident showed that desert and reward seldom keep company.
The Earth has diverse ecosystems, ranging from forests to deserts.
The African landscape is diverse, ranging from lush rainforests to vast deserts.
words.defineEn: a large, dry area of land with very few plants, typically one covered with sand
words.defineVi: một vùng đất rộng lớn, khô ráo với rất ít thực vật, điển hình là một vùng phủ đầy cát

examples: The dog has gone inside.
She knows the business inside out.
He accidentally put his underwear on inside out.
A lot has happened inside these four walls.
She reached inside her bag for a pen.
words.defineEn: in or into a room or building; within a building
words.defineVi: trong hoặc vào một căn phòng hoặc tòa nhà; trong một tòa nhà

examples: The chef incorporated chunks of multiple fruits into a delectable dessert.
The children threw the crumpled paper balls into the classroom trash can.
My wife talked sense into me.
The bakery incorporated finely diced fatback into savory pie crusts for flaky results.
The gymnast effortlessly bent her body into a graceful arch during her routine.
words.defineEn: to the inner part or a position inside an area or place
words.defineVi: đến phần bên trong hoặc một vị trí bên trong một khu vực hoặc địa điểm

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
Red wine leaves a stain.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: to go away from somewhere or someone
words.defineVi: đi khỏi một nơi nào đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The mountain provided a natural barrier between the two valleys.
The mountain is a popular destination for climbers and hikers.
You're making a mountain out of a molehill.
Asian landscapes range from breathtaking mountains to stunning beaches.
They went farther north into the mountains.
words.defineEn: a very tall and large natural structure that looks like a huge hill with a pointed top that is often covered in snow
words.defineVi: một cấu trúc tự nhiên rất cao và lớn trông giống như một ngọn đồi khổng lồ với đỉnh nhọn thường được bao phủ bởi tuyết

examples: Around 200 000 visitors each year come to see the summer palace.
Palace intrigue shakes one of the Middle East's most historically stable monarchies.
'Where is your palace?'
In an instant, the palace dissolved around them.
My home is my palace in reality.
words.defineEn: a large and impressively designed house that is often the official house of a powerful individual such as a president or king
words.defineVi: một ngôi nhà lớn và được thiết kế ấn tượng, thường là nhà chính thức của một cá nhân quyền lực như tổng thống hoặc vua

examples: Their last album sold millions.
Her last book sold millions of copies.
I recently sold my bike.
The tickets are selling like hot cakes
Do not your lawyers sell all their practice, as your priests their prayers?
words.defineEn: to give something to someone in exchange for money
words.defineVi: để đưa một cái gì đó cho một ai đó để đổi lấy tiền

examples: Rugby and art seem strange bedfellows.
The dishwasher is making a strange noise.
He holds strange views on education.
It felt strange to be back in my old school.
The society's preoccupation with safety and stranger danger is just unbelievable.
words.defineEn: having unusual, unexpected, or confusing qualities
words.defineVi: có phẩm chất bất thường, bất ngờ hoặc khó hiểu

examples: She was surprised to find Chinese cabbage at the grocery store.
I'm really surprised that the sequel even holds a candle to the original.
When I tasted the white sauce for the first time, I was pleasantly surprised by its delicate balance of flavors.
She was surprised to find that everyone had left.
Mark was surprised to find out that his close friend, Alex, swings both ways.
words.defineEn: feeling or showing surprise or wonder
words.defineVi: cảm thấy hoặc thể hiện sự ngạc nhiên hoặc thắc mắc

examples: The organization supports various charitable causes through donations.
The increase had a ripple effect through the whole financial market.
The captain navigated the ship through rough waters with skill and expertise.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
The road continues through the village of Knightwick.
words.defineEn: from one side of something or someone to the other; into one side something and out of the other side
words.defineVi: từ một phía của một cái gì đó hoặc một người khác; vào một bên một cái gì đó và ra khỏi phía bên kia

examples: She moved the ball toward the opponent's goal.
He walked toward the park.
Her behavior toward her colleagues was unprofessional.
She worked hard toward her degree.
They learned from their mistakes and used them as stepping stones toward success.
words.defineEn: in the direction of someone or something
words.defineVi: theo hướng của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: The study analyzed the yield of various crops across different regions, providing valuable insights for agricultural planning.
Leaving your valuables in plain sight in your car is asking for a break-in.
He was able to abstract valuable insights from the extensive research.

The business owner reflected on his own youthful mistakes, acknowledging that wanton kittens make sober cats, and that his early errors had taught him valuable lessons that he applied to his business practices.
Did the burglars take anything valuable?
words.defineEn: worth a large amount of money
words.defineVi: trị giá một số tiền lớn

examples: Soon, with the return of the peasants and fishermen, the village comes to life again.
The road continues through the village of Knightwick.
Three villages have gone without water for days.
The village was set among olive groves on a hill.
The place still feels like a small fishing village.
words.defineEn: a very small town located in the countryside
words.defineVi: một thị trấn rất nhỏ nằm ở nông thôn
